ygData.messageBody:
At 17.19 02/07/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Rosethorne Darkensoul <rosethornne@...>
>
>This petition of yours is very interesting, and I must say that I fully
>support your idea on making the monsters resists a bit lower, since
>those spells do use up a lot of mana, and even if the melee classes
>miss as much as the spells are resisted, they dont spend resources like
>mana when fighting. However, it is my firm believe that this is about
>it. I play more than one character, and let me tell you that when the
>game is properly played, the wizards are far from being the class that
>dies the most (the tanks are the ones that run the highest risk,
>particularly the "puller").

Wizard dies much and in many cases when green one hit you on low mana you
risk death, in fight one spell to much and a MOB is on you and if somone
dont get it off you fast you are also dead, no gating to save your life and
so if you are to play outdoors all time then its better to play druid.

>You see, as wizards, you are not supposed
>to use the strongest spells until the monsters are at less than half
>health. You should blast them moderately as the tanks pick at them and
>taunt, to keep the mosters busy. You should do moderate blasts in
>between the work of the tanks until the MOB is down to half health.

I like to do this, and i do this but as you note that as you advance on lv
you start to do two things one is more damage and other is using less mana
for same amount of damage. so if you use your low damage spells to hit a
monster then you effectly use much more mana for same effect the numbers
are counting casting times and mana to damage ratio nearly 20 % to 40 %
more mana it is translated to 1 - 2 bubles of mana more ! And when monster
is runing from you if your spell is resisted you dont have time to cast
another ! If a monster is yellow then your root is also nearly useles as it
will be resisted too much times.

>Now blast away. That way, even if you do a LOT of sudden damage, you
>still havent done most, so the MOb won't fall into you instantly. Let
>the tanks take the blow as you stand back. Since I have played many
>sides of this (I have a ranger, this necro, a wiz, and a druid), I
>should also give this suggestion to wizard players: "If the MOB starts
>to hit on you, DON'T RUN!!".

This is great suggestion if all group is not running then you have much
better chance to survive just staying and group telling HELP they will run
to your side if they are not already.

This will make it impossible for the
>tanks to get the MOB off. At best, try to root him, or better yet, if
>there is a ranger or druid with you, make them cast snare instead of
>root. Has higher success rate, and is overall more reliable. The
>cleric (or druid or shaman) can heal you and the tanks do better work
>if they dont have to chase after a monster while contending with PL and
>other mean variables. Don't get me wrong, a few improvements can be
>made on the classes, but the game has achieved quite a striking balance
>once it is played in a group, as opposed to soloing. Remember, this is
>an online game; if you prefer to solo, this is not the game to play.
>You should look out for Baldur's Gate, or Might and Magic and their
>ilk, not for a game in which grouping and cooperation is the key.

I play always a wizard for at last 20 years and i can say that i like some
aspects of verant interpretation of this class but it is unfortunatly much
different from what i see many persons think a wizard is. I like to play in
group very much and it is nice thing but a wizard need a bard or enchanter
so get his mana up like warrior need cleric. But i have much less coments
on wizard solo play that i have for his group utility as a primary group
class a wizard have too much weak points one is hevy mana use wich mean
long meditation time, to much random effect group need a reliable members
to constantly pull things in and also to get them fast eliminated a wizard
is much more random then buffs or healing or pets they all work all time a
wizard 2 resisted spells are equal to 25% fire power less!! if a warrior
miss 2 times he is not useles for party any more a wizard easy can be.
Warrior you can count on him that will stay in front of MOB and get and
deal his amout of damage a wizard is too random thing he can do fast damage
when it is need to do it but he can also get ressisted too much and then
what for is his fast casting if it is not on MOB when you need it?
Becouse of this i suggested to make a spells resisted less when MOB have
less health.
